sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import api from '../utils/api'; import useAuthStore from '../store/authStore'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; import '../components/SkeletonCard/SkeletonCard.css'; import './Profile.css'; const AVAILABLE_SKILLS = [ 'Project Management', 'Event Planning', 'Communication', 'Leadership', 'Problem Solving', 'Team Coordination', 'Public Speaking', 'Marketing', 'Design', 'Photography', 'Video Editing', 'Content Writing', 'Social Media', 'Budgeting', 'Negotiation' ]; const Profile = () => { const { user, setUser } = useAuthStore(); const [form, setForm] = React.useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', gender: 'Prefer not to say', year: '', department: '', location: '', about: '', skills: [], currentPassword: '', newPassword: '' }); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = React.useState(false); const [loading, setLoading] = React.useState(true); const [stats, setStats] = React.useState({ attended: 0, won: 0 }); useEffect(() => { const load = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const { data } = await api.get('/api/auth/me'); setUser(data); setForm((f) => ({ ...f, name: data.name || '', email: data.email || '', phone: data.phone || '', gender: data.gender || 'Prefer not to say', year: data.year || '', department: data.department || '', location: data.location || '', about: data.about || '', skills: data.skills || [] })); // Fetch stats try { const { data: regs } = await api.get('/api/registrations/my'); const attended = regs.filter(r => r.paymentStatus === 'completed' && r.eventPast).length; const won = 0; // Can be calculated from achievements setStats({ attended, won }); } catch {} } catch {} finally { setLoading(false); } }; load(); }, [setUser]); // derived display helpers const initials = (user?.name || user?.email || '?') .split(' ') .map((s) => s[0]) .join('') .slice(0, 2) .toUpperCase(); const completion = (() => { const fields = ['name', 'email', 'gender', 'year', 'department']; const filled = fields.filter((k) => !!(user && String(user[k] || '').trim())).length; return Math.round((filled / fields.length) * 100); })(); const toggleSkill = (skill) => { setForm(prev => ({ ...prev, skills: prev.skills.includes(skill) ? prev.skills.filter(s => s !== skill) : [...prev.skills, skill] })); }; return (
{/* Header Banner */}
{user?.avatarUrl || user?.photoUrl ? ( ) : (
{initials}
)}

{user?.name || 'User'}

User | {user?.year || '4th Year'}

{/* Stats Cards */}
{stats.attended}
Events Attended
{stats.won}
Events Won
{/* Content Grid */} {!loading && !isEditing && (
{/* Left Column */}
{/* About Section */}

About

{user?.about || 'Dedicated IT professional with expertise in software development and event management. Passionate about technology and continuous learning.'}

{/* Professional Skills */}

Professional Skills

{(user?.skills || ['Project Management', 'Event Planning', 'Communication', 'Leadership', 'Team Coordination']).map((skill, idx) => (
{skill}
))}
{/* Achievements */}

Achievements

Best Hackathon Winner 2024

March 2024

Won first place in the Annual Tech Hackathon

Event Excellence Award

June 2024

Recognized for outstanding event participation

Innovation Challenge Champion

September 2024

Led team to victory in innovation competition

{/* Right Column */}

Profile Information

Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
Name
{user?.name || '-'}
Email
{user?.email || '-'}
Phone
{user?.phone || '+1 (555) 123-4567'}
Gender
{user?.gender || 'Female'}
Year
{user?.year || '4th'}
Department
{user?.department || 'IT'}
Location
{user?.location || 'San Francisco, CA'}
Member Since
January 2024
)} {!loading && user && isEditing && (
setIsEditing(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

Edit Profile

{ e.preventDefault(); try { const { data } = await api.put('/api/auth/me', { name: form.name, email: form.email, phone: form.phone, gender: form.gender, year: form.year, department: form.department, location: form.location, about: form.about, skills: form.skills, currentPassword: form.currentPassword || undefined, newPassword: form.newPassword || undefined, }); setUser(data.user); setForm((f)=>({ ...f, currentPassword:'', newPassword:'' })); toast.success('Profile updated successfully!'); setIsEditing(false); } catch (err) { toast.error(err.response?.data?.msg || 'Update failed'); } }}>
setForm({...form,name:e.target.value})} placeholder="John Doe" />
setForm({...form,email:e.target.value})} type="email" required />
setForm({...form,phone:e.target.value})} placeholder="+1 (555) 123-4567" />
setForm({...form,department:e.target.value})} placeholder="IT" />
setForm({...form,location:e.target.value})} placeholder="San Francisco, CA" />
